title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Self-Reflection for Professional Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental leadership concepts and three or more years of workplace experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will analyze real cases from leadership situations and write reflective journals
Learners will develop weekly leadership action plans and provide feedback on execution results
Learners will evaluate stages of leadership competency development through peer feedback with fellow learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
